title: Rissah
html: RISSAH(Risʹsah) [possibly, Sprinkling].An Israelite wilderness campsite mentioned between Libnah and Kehelathah. (Nu 33:21, 22) Rissah’s location is not certain, though some have connected it with Kuntilla (Gerasa), about 55 km (34 mi) NNW of the northern end of the Gulf of ʽAqaba.
